testimonials.user: Wil Kristin, Strategic Communications Director at Beneficial State Foundation
testimonials.text: Lucas Longacre blends deep experience and passion in AI, storytelling, production, and education to customize approaches that get compelling results efficiently. I've been lucky to work with Lucas across formats and seek his insights regularly to help navigate how emerging technologies can support my goals.

testimonials.user: Tim Williams, Executive Director of Oregon Film
testimonials.text: I have known and worked with Lucas for many years now and I have come to depend on, and admire, his dependability, creativity and problem solving. This has always proven true for jobs I have recommended him for as well as projects we have done together.

testimonials.user: Lauren Carroll, CMO at Mebot AI Corp
testimonials.text: Collaborating with Lucas on AI projects has been an exciting journey. His has a unique ability to tackle intricate technical challenges that deliver elegant solutions. Lucas seamlessly navigates emerging technologies, mastering them to enhance project outcomes. A steadfast collaborator, he consistently strives for excellence, ensuring the optimal success of our AI products.
